tool.name: Chado refresh gene families

param.name: family_name
param.label: Family Name
param.help: Restrict to families beginning with given prefix

param.name: nuke
param.label: Nuke
param.help: Removes all previous gene families data

tool.help:
Adds an entry in the featureprop table in a chado database for each family a gene belongs to (for use in https://github.com/legumeinfo/lis_context_viewer/).
